name: Bernadette
description:
In this short game you play as Chris, who's burnt out and tries to find his happiness again. Help him get past his Demons and learn some new things about life and himself.

GamePlay Features: 

  • Dash and Walljumps
  • 3 big, free roaming levels
  • Keys to search for and unlock goals
  • Demons
  • Controller Support
